name: Checkpoint switcher
description: Like startpos switcher, but for checkpoints!

EnablePreviews.name: Enable checkpoint previews
EnablePreviews.description: Saves a screenshot each time a checkpoint is placed, and shows it to you in the switcher popup.

EnableUI.name: Enable switcher UI
EnableUI.description: Enables buttons much like the buttons in most startpos switchers.

EnableKeybinds.name: Enable switcher keybinds
EnableKeybinds.description: Enables keybinds for switching between checkpoints.
